item.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
item.description: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

item.title: Paramount says Larry Ellison now personally guarantees $40 billion of the Warner Bros. bid
item.description: Larry Ellison now provides a “personal guarantee” of $40 billion of the financing for Paramount’s $108 billion offer to buy Warner Bros. Discovery.

item.title: ‘I don’t want to break up with him’: I’m 32 and my boyfriend wants me to move to Israel. Do I go?
item.description: “I truly see a future with him, but I’ve never imagined myself living in Israel.”

item.title: ‘It’s heartbreaking’: My cousin died and her estranged husband has taken possession of her home. Can we evict him?
item.description: “The house remains in her name. He has since kicked out each of the boys one by one.”
